start_command.label: Start Command
start_command.tooltip: The command to start the fish game.

start_permission.label: Start Permission
start_permission.tooltip: Who is allowed to start the fish game.

start_message.label: Start Message
start_message.tooltip:
The message the bot sends when the fish game starts. Customizations:
{0} is the configured guess command.
{1} is non-exact winner reward, including currency name, e.g. "200 points".
{2} is the exact winner reward, including currency name.
{3} is the highlight multiplier.
{4} is the recommended guess range, e.g. "70-100".
start_message.value: Yo we're about to do the fish minigame, guess how many fish I'll have by the end of the 3rd phase of fish by typing "{0} <number>" in chat! Closest guess wins {1}! Exact guess gets VIP until the next person guesses Exactly Rightâ„¢ and {2}! If you HIGHLIGHT your guess, and you win, you get {3}x the rewards! (Recommended guess: {4})

guess_command.label: Guess Command
guess_command.tooltip: The command to place a guess during the fish game.

guess_duration.label: Duration
guess_duration.tooltip: How long viewers have to make guesses after the fish game starts, in seconds.

guess_recommended_min.label: Recommended Minimum
guess_recommended_min.tooltip: The lower end of the recommended guess range.

guess_recommended_max.label: Recommended Maximum
guess_recommended_max.tooltip: The upper end of the recommended guess range.

guess_nogame_toggle.label: Send No Active Game Message
guess_nogame_toggle.tooltip: If checked, the bot will provide feedback if a user does the guess command when there is no active game.

guess_nogame_message.label: No Active Game Message
guess_nogame_message.tooltip:
The message the bot sends if a user does the guess command when there is no active game. Customizations:
{0} is the name of the user.
guess_nogame_message.value: @{0} There is no active fish game.

guess_toolate_toggle.label: Send Too Late to Guess Message
guess_toolate_toggle.tooltip: If checked, the bot will provide feedback if a user does the guess command after the time to guess is up.

guess_toolate_message.label: Too Late to Guess Message
guess_toolate_message.tooltip:
The message the bot sends if a user does the guess command after the time to guess is up. Customizations:
{0} is the name of the user.
{1} is the configured guess duration.
guess_toolate_message.value: @{0} Sorry, you must place your guess within {1} seconds.

guess_taken_message.label: Taken Guess Message
guess_taken_message.tooltip:
The message the bot sends if a user places a guess which has already been placed by another user. Customizations:
{0} is the name of the user.
{1} is the guess.
guess_taken_message.value: @{0} Someone else already guessed {1}. Yours has been recorded, but you might want to change it.

guess_forme_toggle.label: Allow "Guess For Me"
guess_forme_toggle.tooltip: If checked, sending just the guess command with no guess is allowed. In that case, the user will be assigned a guess based on the recommended range.

guess_forme_message.label: "Guess For Me" Response Message
guess_forme_message.tooltip:
The message the bot sends when a user elects to have the bot find a guess for them. Customizations:
{0} is the name of the user.
{1} is the guess.

guess_forme_noneleft_message.label: "Guess For Me" No More Guesses Message
guess_forme_noneleft_message.tooltip:
The message the bot sends when a user elects to have the bot find a guess for them, but every guess (0-200) is taken. Customizations:
{0} is the name of the user.
guess_forme_noneleft_message.value: @{0} Sorry, all guesses have been taken.

end_command.label: End Command
end_command.tooltip: The command to end the fish game and give rewards.

end_permission.label: End Permission
end_permission.tooltip: Who is allowed to end the fish game.

end_nogame_message.label: No Active Game Message
end_nogame_message.tooltip:
The message the bot sends if a user does the end command when there is no active game. Customizations:
{0} is the name of the user.
end_nogame_message.value: @{0} There is no active fish game.

end_tie_message.label: End Tie Message
end_tie_message.tooltip:
The message the bot sends at the end of the game if there is a tie. Customizations:
{0} is the names of all of the tied users.
{1} is how far from the real value they were.
end_tie_message.value: We have a tie! {0} are {1} off. Rolling for tiebreaker.

end_roll_message.label: End Roll Message
end_roll_message.tooltip:
The message the bot sends at the end of the game if there is a tie when it rolls for each tying user. Customizations:
{0} is the name of the user.
{1} is their roll.

end_winner_message.label: End Winner Message
end_winner_message.tooltip:
The message the bot sends when the game is over, notifying everyone of the winner. Customizations:
{0} is the name of the winning user.
{1} is their guess.
{2} is the real value.
{3} is how much currency they won, including the currency name, e.g. "200 points".
end_winner_message.value: The fish game is over, with a phase 3 score of {2}. The winner is @{0}, with a guess of {1}! They have been awarded {3}.

end_vip_message.label: End VIP Message
end_vip_message.tooltip:
The message the bot sends when the game is over in the case where the winner guessed exactly, informing the broadcaster who needs to be given VIP. Customizations:
{0} is the name of the winning user.
{1} is the name of the previous winner, and might be nothing.
{2} is the broadcaster's name.
end_vip_message.value: @{2}, @{0} just guessed exactly and needs to be given VIP! The previous exact winner who should lose VIP is @{1}.

end_same_vip_message.label: End Same VIP Message
end_same_vip_message.tooltip:
The message the bot sends when the game is over in the case where the winner guessed exactly, but it is the same user who already has VIP. Customizations:
{0} is the name of the winning user.
end_same_vip_message.value: @{0} just guessed exactly, but they already have VIP from last time, so we're all good.

reward_nonexact.label: Non-exact Winner Reward
reward_nonexact.tooltip: How much currency will be given to a winner who does not guess the exact number of fish.

reward_exact.label: Exact Winner Reward
reward_exact.tooltip: How much currency will be given to a winner who guesses the exact number of fish.

reward_bonus_multiplier.label: Highlighted Guess Multiplier
reward_bonus_multiplier.tooltip: The multiplier to apply to rewards for winners who highlighted their guess message.

only_live.label: Only When Live
only_live.tooltip: If checked, commands are only active when stream is live.

reset_defaults.label: Restore Default Settings
reset_defaults.tooltip: Restores all settings to their default values.
